# Module: tf.keras.optimizers



Defined in [`tensorflow/keras/optimizers/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.9/tensorflow/keras/optimizers/__init__.py).

Built-in optimizer classes.

## Classes

[`class Adadelta`](../../tf/keras/optimizers/Adadelta): Adadelta optimizer.

[`class Adagrad`](../../tf/keras/optimizers/Adagrad): Adagrad optimizer.

[`class Adam`](../../tf/keras/optimizers/Adam): Adam optimizer.

[`class Adamax`](../../tf/keras/optimizers/Adamax): Adamax optimizer from Adam paper's Section 7.

[`class Nadam`](../../tf/keras/optimizers/Nadam): Nesterov Adam optimizer.

[`class Optimizer`](../../tf/keras/optimizers/Optimizer): Abstract optimizer base class.

[`class RMSprop`](../../tf/keras/optimizers/RMSprop): RMSProp optimizer.

[`class SGD`](../../tf/keras/optimizers/SGD): Stochastic gradient descent optimizer.
